mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TCashRequestMst (OrderNo, UserNo, PayAmt, UserId, Pgcode) VALUES(#{intorderNo}, #{intUserNo}, #{amount}, #{user_id},#{pgcode})
mapper.select: SELECT TotalCashAmt AS intTotalCashAmt ,TotalInCashAmt AS intTotalInCashAmt ,TotalOutCashAmt AS intTotalOutCashAmt FROM TUserCashMst WHERE UserNo = #{userNo}

SELECT CashNo AS intCashNo ,TransactionDate AS transaction_date ,PurchaseState AS strPurchaseState ,PayAmt AS amount ,CashAmt AS intCashAmt ,Pgcode AS pgcode FROM TCashMst WHERE UserNo = #{userNo} ORDER BY CashNo DESC

SELECT TOP 25 resultTable.* FROM (SELECT TOP (25 * #{curPage}) ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY CashNo DESC) AS rownumber ,CashNo AS intCashNo ,TransactionDate AS transaction_date ,PurchaseState AS strPurchaseState ,PayAmt AS amount ,CashAmt AS intCashAmt ,Pgcode AS pgcode FROM TCashMst WHERE UserNo = #{intUserNo} ) AS resultTable WHERE rownumber > (#{curPage} - 1) * 25
SELECT OrderNo AS intOrderNo ,UserNo AS user_no ,PayAmt AS amount ,UserId AS user_id ,Pgcode AS pgcode FROM TCashRequestMst WHERE OrderNo = #{orderNo}
